description: Identifier of the saved query/report this filter condition belongs to.
Sequential line number of the condition within a query; controls display and default evaluation order.
Free-form condition text stored as a single expression, used instead of structured column/operator/values; likely optional and overrides other parts; confirm with SME.
Numeric precedence or grouping for evaluating conditions within the query; likely dictates execution order beyond row number; confirm with SME.
Primary comparison value for the condition; for ranges or lists, this is the first value. Supports dates, numbers, or text based on the fieldâ€™s type.
Second comparison value used with range operators; otherwise null.
Comparison operator applied between the field and value(s), such as equals, greater than, contains, between, or null checks.
Logical connector to chain this condition to the next one in the query (e.g., AND/OR).
Target data field the condition filters, referencing a column in the operational data model.
User who created the condition record.
Date and time the condition record was created.
User who last updated the condition record.
Date and time the condition record was last modified.
Expected data type of the target field/value, used for validation, formatting, and operator compatibility.
